page.title: 20Moorcroft Shops (Manchester)
page.content: This page is part of a survey project which we did on shops near our school. There are 9 shops. This page is on 4. {Edwards Ltd.(Chemist) { Building Materials} BR/GL/ME/SL/ST/WO { Sells}Shoes, Squash, Sweets, Nappies, Teddies, Rubber ducks, Babies' toilets {Dillons (Newsmarket) { Building Mats.}BR/GL/ME/ST/WO/RU/TI { Sells}Books, Clothes, Drinks, Food, Magazines, Toys, Rackets, Videos, Cards, Stationery, Papers. {Yiannis (Chip shop) { Building Mats.}BR/GL/ME/PL { Sells}Chips, Fish, Pies, Spare ribs, Sausages, Chicken(Legs & Breasts) {Drew (Wine Cellar) { Building Mats.}BR/GL/ME/ST/WO { Sells}Lemonade, Orange, Shandy, Coke, Beer. Food eg.Sweets, Crisps {Key:}BRick GLass MEtal SLate STone WOod RUbber TIles PLastic
